title: Super-Chewy Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['375g plain flour', '1 1/4 teaspoons sea salt', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '170g unsalted butter, softened', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '100g caster sugar', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '1 tablespoon single cream', '335g plain chocolate chips', '175g chopped walnuts, toasted']
